page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: Mrs Everet owns the general shop in{ {Mawgan.}She gets up at 6.00 a.m.It is the only shop.Her working hours start at 7.30 till 7.30 with 1 hour for lunch .She doesn't open on Sunday. Mrs Weal is retired and lives in a cottage at{Mawgan.}She gets up at 8.00 a.m.During the day people visit.She does knitting, goes to clubs such as friendship and the w.i. She cleans six rooms altogether.She goes to bed any time up to 10.00 p.m.She likes the area. Mrs Eddy is retired and has bad eyes. She lives in a council house with her pet bird.She gets up at 7.30a.m.,makes breakfast and does house work.She goes to friendship clubs.It is a lovely place.She likes it and she likes holiday makers.
